title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 480/97 of 14 March 1997 amending Annex I to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 480/97 of 14 March 1997 amending Annex I to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I, Part Two, to Council Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 is hereby amended in accordance with Annex I to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 April 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 March 1997.
For the Commission
Mario MONTI
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 48, 19. 2. 1997, p. 7.
(3) OJ No L 71, 13. 3. 1997, p. 1.
